name: Office milliseconds
description:
welcome to office milliseconds, a clicker game with a win and lose state!

Story One day You did not do half of the task your boss told you to do. So you get told by your boss that before you go home you have to complete all of your task before the timer runs out (yes, this is timed).  you have a plant you need to keep alive but when you water it it slows down your progress and you get tired easily to. You just want to go home so you agreed to do the task.
are you up to the challenge
